title: Here’s everything we know so far about the 2022 iPad Pro
content:
Apple is set to release another generation of iPad Pro in 2022. A year after the model with the M1 chip, miniLED display, and 5G support was first introduced, the company is rumored to launch an even better iPad Pro this year with the upcoming M2 chip.

more…

The post Here’s everything we know so far about the 2022 iPad Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is set to release another generation of iPad Pro in 2022. 9to5Mac rounds up everything known about this upcoming product.
